headline: Jim Cramer Says: “Don’t Be in a Hurry to Buy Lam Research”
summary: Lam Research Corporation (NASDAQ:LRCX) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer recently commented on. During the episode, Cramer recommended against buying the company stock, as he remarked: “It would be best to accept that the food and drugs can have a couple of days in the sun, can’t they? The old leaders pulled back […]
